mapper.sql: ot.id, ot.type, ot.out_url as outUrl, ot.title, ot.image_url as imageUrl, ot.video_url as videoUrl, ot.teacher_desc as teacherDesc, ot.teacher_desc_video as teacherDescVideo, ot.description, ot.outline, ot.classfile_desc as classfileDesc, ot.classfile, ot.read_num as readNum, ot.collection_num as collectionNum, DATE_FORMAT(ot.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate, ot.is_favorite as isFavorite

ot.id, ot.type, ot.out_url as outUrl, ot.title, ot.image_url as imageUrl, ot.video_url as videoUrl, ot.teacher_desc as teacherDesc, ot.teacher_desc_video as teacherDescVideo, CONCAT(SUBSTR(ot.description,1,20),'...') as description, ot.outline, ot.classfile_desc as classfileDesc, ot.classfile, ot.read_num as readNum, ot.collection_num as collectionNum, DATE_FORMAT(ot.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate, ot.is_favorite as isFavorite
mapper.select: select ot.id, ot.out_url as outUrl, ot.title, ot.image_url as imageUrl, ot.read_num as readNum, ot.collection_num as collectionNum from online_traning ot where ot.type=#{conditionOnlineTraning.type} order by ot.create_date DESC limit #{begin},#{shownum}
mapper.update: update online_traning set read_num=read_num+1 where id=#{id}
update online_traning set collection_num=collection_num+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,traning_id as traningId,title,type,seq_no as seqNo,answer,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate from traning_question where traning_id=#{id}
select id,question_id as questionId,select_name as selectName,select_content as selectContent,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate from traning_answer where question_id=#{id}
select b.id as id,b.question_answer as questionAnswer from examination a left join question b on a.exam_id=b.examation_id where 1=1 and a.exam_id=#{examId}
select count(exam_id) as num from examination
select exam_id as examId,title,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createDate from examination order by create_date limit #{begin},#{shownum}
select select_name as selectName,select_content as selectContent from answer where question_id=#{questionId}
select id from answer where question_id=#{questionId}

update online_traning set is_favorite=0 where id=#{id}
